properties.name: allowSearch
properties.description: Specifies whether to enable searching in the header filter.

properties.name: allowSelectAll
properties.description: Specifies whether a "Select All" option is available to users.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Specifies the height of the popup window that contains values for filtering.

subMembers.name: search
subMembers.description: Configures the header filter's search functionality.

properties.name: searchTimeout
properties.description: Specifies a delay in milliseconds between typing a search string and the search execution.

properties.name: texts
properties.description: Contains properties that specify text for various elements of the popup window.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Specifies whether to show header filter icons.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Specifies the width of the popup window that contains values for filtering.
